message.raw:
Add BUILD_TESTING CMake option and tests target

Add CMake option BUILD_TESTING to disable test compilation.
Default value of BUILD_TESTING is ON for backward compatibility.
Added tests target to compile tests when BUILD_TESTING is set to OFF.
